Name: Grand Mojito
Ingredients: 45 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: POUR ingredients into glass and half fill with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Fill glass with more crushed ice and CHURN some more. Keep adding ice and churning until drink fills glass. Serve with straws.
Review: Cognac and orange liqueur adds distinctive rich orange notes to this riff on a Mojito .
History: For more recipes, its origins and history, see the Mojito Cocktail .
